home.description: Full-stack developer focused on Java, Spring Boot, and React. Passionate about building secure, user-centric applications with scalable architectures.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm <1>Ricardo Carreño</1>, a Software Engineering Graduate. I focus on building secure, usable digital products with solid architecture, combining full-stack development with a clear business and security vision.
about.goal: My goal is to design digital experiences that are elegant for the user and resilient for the business, with a special interest in cybersecurity and automation.
about.learning: Currently expanding my training in security, cloud, and modern architectural patterns.
